tool_description: Tracks fulfillment status and timing across order lifecycle stages, calculating processing times and identifying bottlenecks in the fulfillment pipeline.

order_ids.description: List of order IDs to track

sla_hours.description: Expected fulfillment time in hours for SLA calculation

error_messages: Invalid order IDs: Some order IDs do not exist in the system
Order list too large: Maximum 10,000 orders can be tracked in a single request
Invalid timezone: Use standard timezone identifiers like UTC, EST, PST
SLA hours out of range: sla_hours must be between 1 and 720 (30 days)
usage: Provide order_ids array and configure tracking options. Set include_substeps=true for detailed tracking, specify timezone, and configure SLA parameters.

sla_compliance_rate.description: Percentage of orders meeting SLA requirements

status_breakdown.description: Distribution of orders across fulfillment stages
